nodes.text: The Fast Friend was a starship owned and captained by the Devaronian smuggler, Kurjak. In 0 ABY, Kurjak was hired by Del Meeko and Gideon Hask, members of Inferno Squad who were posing as brothers, to deliver them and a container to Eriadu. En route to their destination, the Fast Friend was attacked and boarded by the Opportunity, a pirate ship belonging to the Blood Bone Order and their "Pirate Queen", Lassa Rhayme.
